title: Multipurpose Aromatherapy Sprays
cleaned_text: . Glass Cleaner . Fabric Deodoriser Easy and Convenient! Achieve a Happy and Clean Environment with our Multipurpose Aromatherapy Spray Bottles, which are ideal for everyday use. It is an excellent cleaner and air refresher spray, that removes unpleasant odours with its deodorizing properties. Each bottle contains 200ml of Essential Oil Blends. Product is environmentally safe, non-toxic, non-flammable and bio-degradable. Choose from a selection of the following scents: - Lavender - Citronella - Pandan - Lemongrass - Rose - Orange - Orchid For enquiries and
